mapper.sql: a.id, a.office_id AS "office.id", a.name, a.enname, a.remarks, a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag, o.name AS "office.name", a.useable AS useable
LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_role a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY o.code, a.name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( id, office_id, name, enname, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, is_sys, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysData}, #{useable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET office_id = #{office.id}, name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, is_sys = #{sysData}, useable = #{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
